title: Troy the whippet jumps in fright when he sees his owner wearing a face mask
text:
This is the hilarious moment Troy, a three-year-old whippet, saw his owner in a new face mask for the first time.

The clip, filmed on October 6, in Wales shows Bethan Howells sitting on her bed covered in a chocolate brown face mask.

As she turns herself from the camera to her dog, Troy looks up in shock at his owner's transformation.

He lurches forward making a snarling sound.

Bethan starts laughing and says, through bursts of giggles, 'what's the matter, you don't like my face mask?'

Troy's eyes start to widen as he tries to make sense of what is going on, no doubt recognizing Bethan's voice but not her face covered in the new mask.

Troy continues to look unimpressed before jumping forward up towards Bethan's face as she continues to laugh loudly.

Bethan said that her dog tried to eat off the face mask 'because it scared him.'
description: The clip shows Bethan Howells from Wales sitting on her bed wearing a face mask with her dog Troy. The three-year-old whippet is fearful and tries to eat off the face mask.
